ygData.subject: Manifest Destiny

Subject: Manifest Destiny
References: <3B35C66C.25530.2AA9BCB@localhost>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The chant cut straight into Motormaster fuel pump. All his confusion
washed away, by his passion, in the cause he believed so strongly in. He
may have been created by Decepticons, but he served because he believed
in it. He transformed, stood up, and held out his hand, and followed the
mantra. How he would make Slaughter pay, for making him forget that.
"You heard Megatron boys, Transform to form MENASOR." he said
transforming to his truck mode again. Speedbreaker emerged from the
woods, and joined the three transformed Stunticons.
